column1: +with Mike Pence in charge of controlling the spread of COVID19 the situation will undoubtedly be worse then H1N1
they will be guilt tripped into not taking the sick leave. If they aren't insured the chances of them getting tested for COVID19 are slim to none as it can cost up to $3000.

If we see the number of #COVID19 cases in America skyrocket just know it's because of the lack of support workers have when it comes to healthcare and sick leaves. People will go to work even when they have the symptoms since they couldn't afford to take sick leave
